0.1.name: wordpress/add-me-dichev
0.1.description:
Add Me Dichev simply renders social bookmark buttons with icons after the post body. The plugin generates automatic bookmarks links for more than 60 social networks. It is very simple to modify this plugin and to add, edit or remove bookmark buttons.

Read my tutorial in English and Bulgarian languages to learn how to customize Add Me Dichev plugin.

If you want to translate the plugin tutorial in other languages, please contact me.

The list of the social bookmark networks buttons integrated: addthis.com, blinkbits.com, blinklist.com, blogmarks.net, blogmemes.net, bluedot.us, bloglines.com, co.mments.com, connotea.org,
